title: Construct table for ice cream eating method by age

content.question: Which of the following tables shows the distribution of responses?

choices.label: The figure shows a table with 3 columns and 3 rows. The columns are labeled from left to right; column 1, Cone; column 2, Cup; column 3, Total. The rows are labeled, from top to bottom; row 1, Adults; row 2, Children; row 3, Total. From top to bottom, the data is as follows: Adults; Cone, 35, Cup, 35, Total, 70.
